events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello, I’m John from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order and I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue properly?
Sure, my order number is 12345XYZ and I have attached a picture showing that the item is not what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
That sounds good, I appreciate your quick response and help with the refund.
We have processed your refund. Please allow a few days for the transaction to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have received the refund. Thank you very much for your excellent service!
We are glad to hear the refund was received. Closing this case now, feel free to contact us anytime.
We have sent a short survey to hear about your support experience. Thank you for your feedback!
